00050 static int iFPGAFileDesc = 0;
00051 static int iFPGAStatus = FPGA_STATUS_OFF;

00061 int FPGA_Open(void) 
00062 {
00063         int iReturn = 0;
00064 
00065         //get file descriptor for scrambler device file
00066         iFPGAFileDesc = open(FPGA_DEVICEFILE, O_RDWR);
00067         if( iFPGAFileDesc < 0 ) {
00068                 //error opening device - break and exit with return code
00069                 close(iFPGAFileDesc);
00070                 iFPGAStatus = FPGA_STATUS_OFF;
00071                 return -EFPGA_FILE_OPEN_ERROR;
00072         }
00073 
00074         //call ioctl function to set initial generator polynom
00075         iReturn = ioctl(iFPGAFileDesc, IOCTL_INIT_POLYGEN, DEFAULT_GENERATOR_POLYNOM);
00076         if( iReturn < 0 ) {
00077                 //error initializing device - break and exit with return code
00078                 close(iFPGAFileDesc);
00079                 iFPGAStatus = FPGA_STATUS_OFF;
00080                 return -EIOCTL_ERROR;
00081         }
00082 
00083         iFPGAStatus = FPGA_STATUS_ON;
00084 
00085         return EFPGA_NOERROR;
00086 }
00087 
00097 int FPGA_Close(void) {
00098         
00099         if (iFPGAStatus != FPGA_STATUS_ON) return -EFPGA_STATUS_OFF;
00100         close (iFPGAFileDesc);
00101         iFPGAFileDesc = 0;
00102         iFPGAStatus = FPGA_STATUS_OFF;
00103         return EFPGA_NOERROR;
00104 }

00116 int FPGA_SetGeneratorPolynom(int GP)
00117 {
00118         int iReturn = 0;
00119         
00120         if (iFPGAStatus != FPGA_STATUS_ON) return -EFPGA_STATUS_OFF;
00121 
00122         iReturn = ioctl(iFPGAFileDesc, IOCTL_INIT_POLYGEN, GP);
00123         if( iReturn < 0 ) {
00124                 //error initializing device - break and exit with return code
00125                 close(iFPGAFileDesc);
00126                 iFPGAStatus = FPGA_STATUS_OFF;
00127                 return -EIOCTL_ERROR;
00128         }

00145 int FPGA_Scramble(int operand, int *result) {
00146 
00147         int iReturn = 0;
00148 
00149         if (iFPGAStatus != FPGA_STATUS_ON) return -EFPGA_STATUS_OFF;
00150 
00151         iReturn = write(iFPGAFileDesc, (char *)&operand, sizeof(operand));
00152         if( iReturn < 0 ) {
00153                 //error writing to device - break and exit with return code
00154                 FPGA_Close();
00155                 return -EFPGA_WRITE_ERROR;
00156         }
00157 
00158         iReturn = read(iFPGAFileDesc, (char *)result, sizeof(int));
00159 
00160         if( iReturn < 0 ) {
00161                 //error reading from device - break and exit with return code
00162                 FPGA_Close();
00163                 return -EFPGA_READ_ERROR;
00164         }
00165 
00166         return EFPGA_NOERROR;
00167 }
